Public Code Repo: Source code is available with the product download.
Description: SciDB is a massively parallel DBMS and complex analytics platform. It was conceived and designed to support very large scale quantitative analytics on images, time-series, numerical data and "whole graph" analytics in problem domains like bio-informatics, financial analytics, industrial and scientific sensor networks, and social network applications.
Platform Requirements: Ubuntu 12.04. We will be providing steps to the next versions of RedHat/CentOS and Ubuntu in the 14.7 release
Functionality: Data Management (MPP Database) with integrated massively scalable complex analytics
